Title: On the Crab
Description:
I just got word that a string of pots we dropped this morning hit it BIG. We're on the crab!

Problem is, the rips are getting stronger and we lost track of some of the pots. They're just sitting out there, filled with spiky blue GOLD!

I need you back out there. Hook one of these buoys up to any of the full traps you find and send it to the surface for us.
ObjectivesText: Attach a Mist-Hopper Buoy to 8 Full Crab Pots on the Shelf of Mazu.
CompletionText:
You smell that, green?

<Arie takes a big, dramatic whiff of rank, fishy air.>

Smells like money!

Objectives.Text: Full Crab Pots Sent to Surface
